name: Sweets & Robots
description:
The robots have risen.

You only have sweets with you for your survival. Throw the sweets at the robots before they get you!

Can you survive the robot apocalypse with just sweets?

How to Play

Just flick the mouse in the direction you want to throw the sweets.

Difficulty might be FlappyBird-esque at first, but should be easier as you get used to the controls.

Mobile Version

Unfortunately, there is no unlockable achievements & leaderboards in the non-mobile version. The mobile version with unlockable achievements & leaderboards is available on Google Play.
